item.title: Jenkins X Observability with Grafana Demo
item.description:
At the Jenkins X Office Hours, in march 2021, I did another demo of using the Grafana stack (loki/promtail, tempo, prometheus and grafana) for platform-level and Continuous Delivery Indicators observability in a Jenkins X platform (tekton, lighthouse, …)

Tomorrow at the @jenkinsxio Office Hours I'll do another demo and status update on the @grafana integration. Observability is coming to Jenkins X!

item.title: Jenkins X Observability with Grafana Demo
item.description:
At the Jenkins X Office Hours, in february 2021, I did a demo of how to setup the Grafana stack (loki/promtail, tempo, prometheus and grafana) in a Jenkins X platform (tekton, lighthouse, …)

If you're into CI/CD and observability, tomorrow at the @jenkinsxio Office Hours I'll do a demo of how to setup the @grafana stack (loki, promtail, tempo, prometheus and grafana) in a Jenkins X platform (tekton, lighthouse, ...) https://t.co/urrqP16lEo

item.title: Jenkins X Pipelines Visualizer Demo
item.description:
At the Jenkins X Office Hours, in september 2020, I did a demo of the new UI for Jenkins X Pipelines that we wrote at Dailymotion, and then shared as open-source with the Jenkins X community.

You can read more about it in the following Jenkins X blog post: New UI to visualize your pipelines and logs - or check out the github repository.

Update: there was a more recent blog post on New features in the pipelines visualizer UI.
